step_responses.employee_message: Generate a quotation for Robert Brown, they want Toyota Camry sedan, silver color

api_response.message:
Mukhang may issue sa system natin sa pag-generate ng quotation. Pero don't worry, I can still assist you. 

Pwede mo bang ibigay ang additional details tulad ng budget range, financing preferences, o kung may special requirements ka for the quotation? Para mas madali natin maayos ito.
